Articles.Content:
Hello, I was wondering if there was a mod with parts that operate as a station hub( connections in different directions) but also has the option to spin around its horizontal axis? I ask because I wan't to build large interplanetary craft, but do not want to use the inflatable Hab Pack mod and instead wan't to attempt building my own circular structure.

Edited March 2, 2016 by Likasombodee
Deep Spece exploration contains a station hub part

42 minutes ago, Likasombodee said:

Hello, I was wondering if there was a mod with parts that operate as a station hub( connections in different directions) but also has the option to spin around its horizontal axis? I ask because I wan't to build large interplanetary craft, but do not want to use the inflatable Hab Pack mod and instead wan't to attempt building my own circular structure.

Yup DSEV has the best Hub to use , then you can build an design your own revolving bits , you do need the Infernal Robotics Plugin to make things spin though

Heres one i made earlier using 3 different Mods combined into one , scroll forward in the video to about the 55 second mark to see things spinning
This sounds pretty close to what you're looking for.

Thanks guys! I guess I wasn't looking hard enough.

I was aware of that DSE mod, but didn't realize that it would have a spinning hub.

Puggonaut that video though! 

Will be following Darkside Tech.
